author: NewsBreak Original
title: Local homeless shelter staying open 24 hours during cold weather, calling for volunteers
text: TULSA, Okla. — As the temperatures continue to drop, a Tulsa homeless shelter is calling on the community to step up. The Merchant in the Pearl District is planning to stay open 24 hours a day until next Thursday to help get people off the streets and into a warm place, but they say they need more volunteers to help out. The Merchant Shelter The shelter normally opens for 2 hours, but is turning into a 24-hour shelter. Paul Schmidt, who runs the shelter, is stocking up on supplies at The Merchant to make sure the homeless community have a warm place to stay. "We’re wanting just to help where we can, get as many in as we can and make sure they don’t freeze," Schmidt said. Schmidt says its vital to help get people off the streets. "In Tulsa, right now there’s 560 shelter beds. In Tulsa right now there close to 1,200 [people] that are out every night. We are way short of shelter beds and with this kind of weather, they will die if something isn't done," Schmidt said. "In the last year, we’ve had a good number of people have passed away from weather-related cold weather and so it’s a very real thing." He says temporary cots they have will give 40 people somewhere to sleep. The Merchant Shelter Cot Schmidt says the shelter normally feeds around 150 people a day, but they’ll have to give out 3 meals a day during the bad weather which Iron Gate will help out with. "After we serve the evening meals, these will all fold up and go into the back of the kitchen and then we’ll put cots down around here," Schmidt said. He says because of donations, they’ve stocked up on warm clothes and have 150 blankets. Schmidt is calling for volunteers to help out at the shelter. "We’re trying to get at least 4 volunteers for every 4 hours," Schmidt said. "We do have security, we do have fire people in the building, but we need people helping serve the meals. Help, just be here for the people. So it’s really important, we need all the help we can get right now." He’s calling on the community to help and says it might just save a life "If you want to help save lives this is a chance," Schmidt said. The Merchant is opening Friday evening at 5 p.m. and is going to stay open through to next Thursday morning. To contact the shelter and sign up to volunteer on the Merchant Facebook page, click here . The Merchant Shelter

author: Valley City Times-Record
title: The digital currency platform Enet Crypto Center Limited successfully obtained the U.S. Fincen MSB license, legalizing and regularizing transactions. | User | times-online.com
text: On December 20th, after submitting proof of MSB registration completion, Enet Crypto Center Limited (hereinafter referred to as Enet) officially obtained the U.S. Fincen MSB license on November 15. This marks a further step in Enet's compliance journey, allowing it to legally conduct currency exchange business in the United States, further expanding its international development space. This establishes a solid foundation for serving global users and enables Enet to provide users with safer, compliant, efficient, and convenient digital economic transaction services Since 2018, the U.S. Department of Treasury and the Securities and Exchange Commission have repeatedly emphasized that MSBs (Money Services Businesses) include virtual currency exchanges and their managers. The regulated entities are businesses and companies related to financial services. The regulatory scope includes international remittances, foreign exchange, currency trading, ICO issuance, and management of prepaid projects. Operating digital asset-related business within the United States requires a license. Hence, Enet’s possession of the license grants it legal status in the U.S., distinguishing it from other irregular platforms. Enet Exchange has always sought higher-level and broader development. As a global leader in decentralized exchanges, it is committed to breaking national boundaries and achieving global integration. Based on Enet's public blockchain technology, it aims to realize scenario implementations in various fields, including capital, digital asset management, digital asset payment, blockchain charity, blockchain gaming, blockchain entertainment, blockchain shopping, and blockchain community games, thereby creating a complete decentralized digital asset ecosystem. Holding a license is of great significance for current exchanges. Obtaining official permission from the respective countries reflects the strength and credibility of the exchange. For most exchanges, a license also acts as a natural barrier for selection. For users, Enet's compliant operation under regulatory conditions is a major advantage, meaning their investments will receive legal protection. Under official permission, Enet strictly meets local regulatory requirements and user protection regulations. Enet will continue to advance its compliance and globalization development, providing safe and convenient digital asset transaction services to more global users. It also calls on other platforms to join the regular development path, contributing to the industry's progress and hoping to achieve industry compliance consensus. Disclaimer: The information provided in this press release is not a solicitation for investment, or intended as investment advice, financial advice, or trading advice. It is strongly recommended that you practice due diligence (including consultation with a professional financial advisor) before investing in or trading securities and cryptocurrency. author: Surenã Dias
title: Terapia de casal salva casamento? Psicólogo explica decisão de Lucas antes do BBB 24
text:
Em entrevista à CARAS Brasil, Alexander Bez comentou a decisão de Lucas em fazer terapia de casal antes do BBB 24 e explicou importância de método
Os detalhes envolvendo o casamento de Lucas Henrique, do BBB 24, ainda têm gerado debate nas redes sociais. Nesta quarta-feira, 3, a ex-esposa do professor revelou que os dois já fizeram terapia de casal para superar uma traição do passado. O caso foi analisado pelo psicólogo Alexander Bez, que falou com exclusividade com a CARAS Brasil sobre o assunto e explicou como a decisão ainda é muito importante para casais.
"Para lidar com a traição e superá-la, é crucial entender os motivos por trás desse comportamento e reconhecer que a confiança nunca será totalmente restaurada. A comunicação e a avaliação da harmonia e da intimidade do casal são essenciais. Superar a traição requer uma jornada árdua de conciliação, especialmente devido ao trauma emocional envolvido", diz.
Em desabafo no Instagram, Camila Moura revelou que a traição de Lucas foi tão traumática para o relacionamento, que os dois precisaram fazer terapia juntos. Para ela, o novo episódio foi ainda mais doloroso que o anterior: "Ele sabia que se fizesse isso de novo não teria perdão".
Segundo o especialista, traição ainda segue sem sendo um dos principais motivos por trás de separações de casais sólidos. "A fidelidade é fundamental para uma relação saudável, e a traição mina a confiança essencial para o casamento", explica.
Leia também:
Camila Moura revela que já foi traída por Lucas Henrique antes do BBB 24
"A paixão genuína impede a traição na maioria dos casos, e a repetição desse comportamento tende a ser alta, sugerindo problemas mais profundos na relação", completa o psicólogo, que argumenta em quais casos é recomendado terapia de casal.
Alexander avalia que quando a fidelidade e o companheirismo do casal são violados, é o grande sinal que algo precisa ser restaurado. "é recomendada, especialmente em casos de estresse extremo", afirma ele, que ainda continua explicando sobre outras possibilidades.
"Também é indicada para casos de imaturidade ou influência familiar e social negativa. No entanto, em situações onde há falta de caráter ou problemas psicológicos mais profundos, a terapia individual pode ser mais eficaz para fortalecer a pessoa traída e tomar decisões saudáveis para o futuro", finaliza.

author: Laura Nathalia Quintero
title: Alerta por perturbaci\u00f3n tropical que afecta a San Andr\u00e9s, Providencia, Santa Catalina y zonas del Caribe: hay probabilidad de formaci\u00f3n de cicl\u00f3n
text: El Instituto de Hidrología, Meteorología y Estudios Ambientales (Ideam) compartió un nuevo comunicado especial, este 1 de noviembre, sobre una perturbación tropical que afecta el Archipiélago de San Andrés, Providencia y Santa Catalina y a zonas del litoral de la región del Caribe colombiana. (Le recomendamos: Docente fue asesinada a tiros en un salón de belleza en La Guajira: presunto responsable tenía denuncia en su contra por amenazas a la víctima). Se trata de la perturbación tropical AL95, la cual es "asociada a un sistema de baja presión", según se explica en la página oficial de la entidad, que permanece monitoreando los fenómenos climáticos y tropicales que golpean los alrededores del país. Se reportó que dicho sistema ha estado generando fuertes lluvias acompañadas de descargas eléctricas en varios sectores del mar caribe. Por lo que actualmente, se mantiene un estado de alerta de vigilancia en las regiones insular oriental del litoral caribe y de alerta de aviso en las zonas central y occidental del litoral caribe. "Se invita a la comunidad marítima a estar atentos a los diferentes pronósticos y comunicados de las entidades con respecto a la perturbación ciclónica, la cual se encuentra en el occidente del Mar Caribe lo cual propiciará precipitaciones sobre el Caribe colombiano", se anunció desde el Ideam. Además, la institución sugirió a las personas mantener medidas de seguridad en sus actividades náuticas y en la movilización de embarcaciones que se encuentran en la zona, de acuerdo con las disposiciones de la autoridad marítima local. Se aclaró que dicha autoridad, a través de las Capitanías de cada puerto, informarán sobre posibles limitaciones y medidas adicionales para mantener la seguridad en las actividades que se lleven a cabo en los sectores marino-costeros. (Además: Ya salieron los resultados de las pruebas Saber 2024: ¿cómo saber si son buenos sus resultados y a qué beneficios puede optar?). El Ideam aclaró que la amplia zona de baja presión tiene una probabilidad de formación ciclónica de 30% para los próximos dos días y de 80% para los siguientes siete días. Sin embargo, se prevé un "desarrollo paulatino del sistema mientras se dirige hacia el noroccidente, alejándose del territorio nacional". REDACCIÓN ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS.
